Question: This person has twice won the Academy Award for Best Actor, for One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest and for As Good as It Gets.
Hints: John Joseph "Jack" this person (born April 22, 1937) is an American actor, film director, producer, and writer.
However, this person's performance in Hoffa also earned him a Golden Globe nomination.
This person grew up in Neptune City, New Jersey.
